text: Dumfries and Galloway is a council area in south west Scotland. In takes in three counties: * Dumfriesshire * Kirkcudbrightshire * Wigtownshire The main and biggest town of the region is Dumfries. Dumfries is 60 miles south of Edinburgh, the capital of Scotland. Category:Dumfries and Galloway
title: Dumfries and Galloway
